wallet.title: Wallet

description.notice: You must initialize your wallet to invest.
description.title: Your private, secure wallet
description.details: We're committed to making sure your funds are as safe as they can possibly be when using our platform. To do this, we prevent the management of your money by anyone other than you. | This is why we use a third-party secure wallet to store your money and approve investments into projects. To start the process of initializing your wallet - click on the button below.

wallet.wallet_not_active_notice: Your wallet is pending approval from an administrator. You can deposit funds while pending approval.
wallet.wallet_empty_notice: Your wallet is empty. Deposit funds to get started.

deposit.title: Deposit
deposit.notice: After you have deposited the money onto our bank account it can take up to 24h for it to become visible on the platform. You will be notified by email when your money has been received.

pending.notice: You have a pending withdrawal request. | Please approve it to have money deposited into your account. | It can take up to 24 hours to process the transaction.

no_bank.notice: You cannot withdraw money without an active bank account.
